Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 31st overall pick, by Seattle in 2011...
Traded from Seattle to Los Angeles (A) on 2/23/2011 (Going to SEA: P T. Anderson. Going to LAA: CF B. Goodwin)...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to New York (A) on 5/15/2011 (Going to NYA: CF B. Goodwin, 1B A. Dickerson, P A. Pacheco. Going to LAA: DH M. Jacobs)...
Injured on 7/6/2013 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 5 days...
Traded from New York (A) to Chicago (A) on 4/15/2014 (Going to NYA: P S. Koyo. Going to CHA: CF B. Goodwin)...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/16/2017, off Carlos Silva (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/18/2017, off Matt Harvey (MIN)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Tampa Bay on 9/13/2017...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 2018...
Drove in 7 runs against Minnesota on 4/14/2019...
Injured on 7/5/2020 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 6 hits with 2 RBI against Toronto on 10/1/2020...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Kansas City on 5/12/2021...
Injured on 8/3/2021 with a Fractured Finger, out for 3 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Minnesota on 5/13/2022...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/17/2022, hitting .483 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Injured on 5/21/2022 with a Fractured Hand, out for 7 weeks...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Oakland on 7/3/2022 (Going to CHA: P D. Storen, RF G. Springer, C W. Warren Jr., P J. Quintana, P C. Martin. Going to OAK: P M. Pineda, C T. Blume, CF B. Goodwin, P
H. Street)...
